name: concept
schema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" version="1.0">

  <xs:element name="concept" type="concept"/>

  <xs:element name="conceptScheme" type="conceptScheme"/>

  <xs:element name="vocabulary" type="vocabulary"/>

  <xs:complexType name="concept">
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="altLabels" type="xs:string"/>
      <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="broader" type="xs:string"/>
      <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:string"/>
      <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/>
      <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="narrower" type="xs:string"/>
      <xs:element name="prefLabels">
        <xs:complexType>
          <xs:sequence>
            <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="entry">
              <xs:complexType>
                <xs:sequence>
                  <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="key" type="languagesEnum"/>
                  <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="value" type="xs:string"/>
                </xs:sequence>
              </xs:complexType>
            </xs:element>
          </xs:sequence>
        </xs:complexType>
      </xs:element>
      <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="topConceptOf" type="xs:string"/>
      <xs:element name="uri" type="xs:string"/>
    </xs:sequence>
  </xs:complexType>

  <xs:complexType name="conceptScheme">
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="description" type="xs:string"/>
      <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="hasTopConcept" type="xs:string"/>
      <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:string"/>
      <xs:element name="title" type="xs:string"/>
      <xs:element name="uri" type="xs:string"/>
    </xs:sequence>
  </xs:complexType>

  <xs:complexType name="vocabulary">
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:string">
        <xs:annotation>
          <xs:documentation><![CDATA[Global unique and persistent identifier of the ontology.]]></xs:documentation>
        </xs:annotation>
      </xs:element>
      <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string">
        <xs:annotation>
          <xs:documentation><![CDATA[Brief and descriptive name of ontology.]]></xs:documentation>
        </xs:annotation>
      </xs:element>
      <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="URI" type="xs:string"/>
    </xs:sequence>
  </xs:complexType>

  <xs:simpleType name="languagesEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:enumeration value="ENGLISH"/>
      <xs:enumeration value="FRENCH"/>
      <xs:enumeration value="GERMAN"/>
      <xs:enumeration value="GREEK"/>
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
</xs:schema>
